# Load data for Trachea droplet


```{r}
library(here)
source(here('30_tissue_supplement_figures', 'supplemental_figures.R'))
save_folder = here('30_tissue_supplement_figures', 'Trachea', 'droplet')
dir.create(save_folder, recursive=TRUE)
method = "droplet"

tissue_of_interest = 'Trachea'
filename = paste0('droplet_',tissue_of_interest, '_seurat_tiss.Robj')
load(here('00_data_ingest', '04_tissue_robj_generated', filename))

# Make sure cluster ids are numeric
tiss@meta.data[, 'cluster.ids'] = as.numeric(tiss@meta.data[, 'cluster.ids'])


additional.group.bys = sort(c())

group.bys = c(standard.group.bys, additional.group.bys)

genes_to_check = c("Cck", "Cdh1", "Col1a1", "Col8a1", "Epcam", "Foxj1", "Krt5", "Pdgfra", "Pdgfrb", "Pecam1", "Ptprc", "Scgb1a1", "Syp")
```

# Make TSNEPlots, DotPlots and Ridgeplots of data

```{r use-optipng, optipng=''}
dot_tsne_ridge(tiss, genes_to_check, save_folder, prefix = prefix,
    group.bys = group.bys, method = method)
```

## Subset: EPITHELIAL

## Subset: "Epithelial"
```{r optipng='-o1'}
Epithelial.cells.use = rownames(tiss@meta.data)[tiss@meta.data$cell_ontology_class == "epithelial cell"]
write(paste("Number of cells in Epithelial subset:", length(Epithelial.cells.use)), stderr())
Epithelial.n.pcs = 2
Epithelial.res.use = 0.2
Epithelial.perplexity = 30
Epithelial.genes_to_check = c("Foxj1", "Krt14", "Krt5", "Scgb1a1")
Epithelial.tiss = SubsetData(tiss, cells.use=Epithelial.cells.use, )
Epithelial.tiss <- Epithelial.tiss %>% ScaleData() %>% 
  FindVariableGenes(do.plot = TRUE, x.high.cutoff = Inf, y.cutoff = 0.5) %>%
  RunPCA(do.print = FALSE)
Epithelial.tiss <- Epithelial.tiss %>% FindClusters(reduction.type = "pca", dims.use = 1:Epithelial.n.pcs, 
    resolution = Epithelial.res.use, print.output = 0, save.SNN = TRUE) %>%
    RunTSNE(dims.use = 1:Epithelial.n.pcs, seed.use = 10, perplexity=Epithelial.perplexity)

```

### Highlight which cells are in this subset
```{r optipng='-o1'}
colors.use = c('LightGray', 'Coral')
tiss@meta.data[, "Epithelial"] = "(Not in subset)"
tiss@meta.data[Epithelial.cells.use, "Epithelial"] = "Epithelial" 
filename = make_filename(save_folder, prefix="Epithelial", 'highlighted', 
    'tsneplot_allcells')
p = TSNEPlot(
  object = tiss,
  do.return = TRUE,
  group.by = "Epithelial",
  no.axes = TRUE,
  pt.size = 1,
  no.legend = TRUE,
  colors.use = colors.use
) + coord_fixed(ratio = 1) +
    xlab("tSNE 1") + ylab("tSNE 2")
ggsave(filename, width = 4, height = 4)

filename = make_filename(save_folder, prefix="Epithelial", 'highlighted', 
    'tsneplot_allcells_legend')
# Plot TSNE again just to steal the legend
p = TSNEPlot(
    object = tiss,
    do.return = TRUE,
    group.by = "Epithelial",
    no.axes = TRUE,
    pt.size = 1,
    no.legend = FALSE,
    label.size = 8,
    colors.use = colors.use
    ) + coord_fixed(ratio = 1) +
    xlab("tSNE 1") + ylab("tSNE 2")

# Initialize an empty canvas!
ggdraw()
# Draw only the legend
ggdraw(g_legend(p))
ggsave(filename, width = 8, height = 4)
dev.off()

```
## tSNE, dotplots, and ridgeplots of this subset
```{r optipng='-o1'}
dot_tsne_ridge(Epithelial.tiss, Epithelial.genes_to_check,
    save_folder, prefix = "Epithelial", group.bys, "droplet")

```
